question: Which nation's indigenous culture was "Diquis"?
explanation: Diquis was the pre-Columbian indigenous culture of Costa Rica. It was flourished from 700 AD to 1530 AD. In Boruca language, "Diquis" means "great water". It was a part of the Greater Chiriqui culture. One of the important features of the Diquis Culture was the "stone spheres", also known as Diquis Spheres.
